name: sillytavern-uwu-translation
description: Simplified SillyTavern translation extension with ChatML support and direct language input.

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development sass src/styles/main.scss dist/style.css --source-map & cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.cjs --watch
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sass src/styles/main.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.cjs

author: ICSLI
